remarks: Value of preliminary map from vectors to functionals at zero.  (Restated ~ mapdhval0 .)  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap1val0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap1val0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1val0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap1val0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmap1val0.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1val0.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmap1val0.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hdmap1val0.s $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap1val0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap1val0.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
hdmap1val0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmap1val0 $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` <. X , F , .0. >. ) = Q ) $.
